musicCollection.title: Recent Additions
musicCollection.shortdesc: These are some highlights that have recently joined my music collection

cdRow.comments: What an odd name! But it's the perfect music to listen to while coding. Or running. Or reading. Not for the folkies.
Wonderful guitar music, with a bit of trumpet thrown in. Pairs nicely with a salmon dinner and white wine.
What a nice discovery as a free gift.
Great guitar and super squeeze boxing.
